Comments_List: I loved this course because it integrated lectures with real-life scenarios. It challenged us to think broadly about pathophysiology at the molecular and organism level,  to appreciate how different organ systems interconnect and work together, and how to identify the level at which problems occur.
The course is well-organized, requires a high level of participation which facilitates learning but at the same time, it not too work intensive.
